title: Migrate /Users/ture/projects/microvm-orchestrator MCP server to this repo
Review async Python code for blocking operations
description:
Audit the codebase to identify any blocking operations in our async Python code that could prevent parallel request handling. Look for:
- Synchronous I/O operations
- Blocking library calls
- CPU-bound operations not offloaded to thread pools
- Missing await statements
- Any code that could block the event loop

title: refactor project structure
description: Codebase should follow best uv project structure practice, we should prepare this project to be something that can be run with uvx
